speaker: Agent
text: Hi, this is Mark from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: What the hell do you want? I'm not in the mood for this crap!

speaker: Agent
text: I understand this isn't the best time. I'm calling about your account. Can I please have your date of birth for verification?

speaker: Customer
text: Why the hell should I tell you anything? You're just after my money!

speaker: Agent
text: I completely understand your frustration. However, I need to verify your identity before discussing any details. Can you confirm your address for me?

speaker: Customer
text: It's 1234 Elm St, but I don't see why that matters!

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for that information. You currently have a balance of $500. How would you like to proceed?

speaker: Customer
text: This is all bullshit! I'm not paying a dime!

speaker: Agent
text: I understand your concerns. We can discuss options to settle the balance. Would you like to hear about a payment plan?

speaker: Customer
text: I don't want to hear any of your pathetic excuses! Just drop dead!

speaker: Agent
text: I appreciate you sharing your feelings. My goal is to assist you. Can we explore alternative options together?

speaker: Customer
text: Explore this! I'm done talking to you!

speaker: Agent
text: I understand. If you change your mind, we're here to help you. Thank you for your time.
